REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f2165 reute b f BC-/U.S-SENATE-OVERRIDES 04-02 0051

TEXT.TITLE: U.S SENATE OVERRIDES REAGAN'S HIGHWAY BILL VETO
TEXT.BODY: The Senate overrode President Reagan's veto of an 88 billion dlr highway funding bill, 67-33. The measure now becomes law. It was a major personal loss for Reagan, who came to the Capitol earlier in the day to campaign for support. Reuter
